name: Ball Game (itch) (FPGames)
description: In this game you are a ball. You have to complete 12 levels as fast as you can by hitting the red button at the end of them . You control the ball by clicking the position you want it to boost to. The amount of boosts you have is limited, but you can get more of them by collecting the pink spheres. There are also green pads that boost you up and lava, that kills you. Have fun :)
